channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ North Carolina State University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Certified Robustness for Deep Equilibrium Models via Serialized Random Smoothing
item.description: Accelerate DEQ certification up to 7x with Serialized Random Smoothing (SRS), achieving certified robustness on large-scale datasets without sacrificing accuracy.

item.title: Does Worst-Performing Agent Lead the Pack? Analyzing Agent Dynamics in Unified Distributed SGD
item.description: A few high-performing agents using efficient sampling strategies can significantly boost the overall convergence speed of distributed machine learning algorithms, surpassing the performance of many mo…

item.title: ProTransformer: Robustify Transformers via Plug-and-Play Paradigm
item.description: ProTransformer robustifies transformers with a novel plug-and-play attention mechanism, significantly improving robustness across various tasks and domains without retraining.

item.title: Robust Graph Neural Networks via Unbiased Aggregation
item.description: RUNG: a novel GNN architecture boasting superior robustness against adaptive attacks by employing an unbiased aggregation technique.

item.title: UQ-Guided Hyperparameter Optimization for Iterative Learners
item.description: Uncertainty-aware HPO boosts iterative learner performance by over 50%, reducing regret and exploration time via a novel UQ-guided scheme.
